knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)

# Running the experiment

## Generate the arrays
```{r}
number_of_repetitions <- c(0:4)
sizes <- c("100", "1000", "10000", "100000")
```
## Generate the combinations
```{r}
experiments <- crossing(number_of_repetitions, sizes)

experiments
```
## Run the functions
```{r}
write.csv(experiments, "../data/experiments.csv", row.names=FALSE)
```
